title: Mill on the Floss adjective sweet

content.question: In the second sentence of the first paragraph, the narrator describes old Christmas’ “imprisonment” as “sweet” to suggest that

choices.label: Tom and Maggie’s life together is wonderful
holiday traditions, while nice, are too predictable
Tom and Maggie cannot escape their home in the wintry conditions
the holiday provides a welcome break from the dreariness of winter

content.answer: the holiday provides a welcome break from the dreariness of winter

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
